course_title: Missiology in Ecumenical and Global Perspectives
class_notes: (ONLINE: live synchronous meeting Thursdays 1:00pm-2:20pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via asynchronous online engagement)
course_description: Designed to foster a study of missiology, the course will explore key historical developments and new understandings of mission in contemporary ecumenical forums and emerging Christian global perspectives, helping students develop into leaders in mission discussions and missional practices.
instructors: Luis Wesley de Souza - Primary Instructor
sections: Class Nbr: 5818, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-2:20p, Instructor: de Souza/Elliott, Status: Open
